name: DUDE |Action FPS game
description:
DUDE is an Action fps game

 I made while learning more about the godot game engine

This is the first godot game I have released

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Get to the stick girl to progress through levels

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS
WASD for movement

mouse aim

left mouse click shoot

Escape(ESC) Pause game

Browser Requirements if running game on web:

your browser should support webgl 2 (example, Chrome , firefox etc...)
